abstract: Global private equity firms are seeking to raise capital from China’s wealthy individuals and institutions, even as the nation works to create a private equity industry of its own.
snippet: Global private equity firms are seeking to raise capital from China’s wealthy individuals and institutions, even as the nation works to create a private equity industry of its own.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI  A few weeks ago, Stephen A. Schwarzman, the chairman of the Blackstone Group, the world’s biggest private equity firm, signed a joint venture here with Shanghai’s municipal government, creating the first Blackstone fund denominated entirely in Chinese currency.

headline.main: Attention Shifts to China for Private Equity Industry
headline.print_headline: Blackstone’s Deal Is a Nod to China’s Currency and New Wealth
